narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A VALID USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
To obtain a C license to exhibit animals to the public the licensing fee must be sent to:
USDA, APHIS, AC
920 Main Campus
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
